repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The manuscript is of Taittirīyabrāhmaṇa and it contains the Kāṇḍa 3, Prapāṭhaka 4 and 7-9. On front guard folio - (approximately 4-5 syllables are illegible.) agnade pustakaṃ narasimhācāryāt aśvamedhaṃ.

msItem.title: Taittirīyabrāhmaṇa. Kāṇḍa 3

filiation.p: VOHD II,7: Nr. 2276 New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 08 pp:210-212

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 brahmaṇe brāhmaṇamālabhate . kṣatrāya rājanyam . marudbhyo vaiśyaṃ . tapase śudraṃ. tamase taskaraṃ . nārakāya virahaṇaṃ . pāpmane klibaṃ ākrayāyā 1v 2 yoguṃ . kāmāya pūṃścaluṃ . atikṛṣṭāya māgadhaṃ . 1. 39r 1 prajāpatiraśvamedhaṃ asṛjat so asmādasṛṣṭo apākramat
msItem.explicit: 69r 3 ha vai tatra ya u cainamevaṃ veda catvāryaśītiḥ .. prajāpatira śvamedhaṃ juhvati . hariḥ oṃ śrīkṛṣṇārpaṇamastu śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ .
msItem.colophon: 69r 4 varśe sādhāraṇesiṃha kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ budhe hani adaśvamedhamityāhusvitithyākṣapaśmcimaṃ kenaḍuvasya ca vaṃśesmin kāśyapiyya (3 illegible syllables.) 69r5 na ca . śrīvāsayati pādasevyā rāmānujena tat likhitaṃ tatca likhitam tat savinyasram śrivāsayatirāṭpade

support.p: Thin palm leaf as guard cover.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: good state of preservation with little broken edges, and worm eaten folio.

handNote.desc: Readable but some clusters are illegible.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written on 1v and 39r.
On first blank folio śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ ācchidaṃ aśvamedhaṃ naramedhaṃ rāmānujadāsasyedaṃ śrīmate śīnivāsamahādeśikāta namaḥ .

origin.origDate: The date is incomplete as the year is not mentioned. It was completed on some unknown year on the 8th day of the second fortnight on the evening of wedensday. It was written by the rāmānuja.

listBibl.bibl: The Taittirīya Brāhmaṇa with the commentary of Bhaṭṭa Bhāskara Miśra Aṣṭaka III part 1 and 2 Edi by A Mahadeva Shastri and L Shrinivasacarya Motilal Banarasi das Delhi Reprint 1985 (Original Mayor Government press Publication Part I- 1911 and part II-1913.)

encodingDesc.p: Spapces are added to separate words.
